headline: Silicon Metals Corp. Completes Acquisition of Crystal Hills Project
summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - December 8, 2025) - SILICON METALS CORP. (CSE: SI) (FSE: X6U) ("Silicon" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that, further to the Company's news releases dated November 26, 2025, it has closed its previously announced acquisition of the Crystal Hills Project in Clarkson Township, Ontario.Pursuant to a share purchase agreement (the "Agreement") dated November 25, 2025, the Company acquired all the issued and outstanding shares of 1504947 B.C....

headline: TempraMed Announces Strategic Agreement with Maccabi Healthcare Services, a Leading HMO with over 2.8 Million Patients

(CSE: VIVI) ("TempraMed" or the "Company"), a medical technology innovator transforming how temperature-sensitive medications are stored and managed, is pleased to announce a major commercial milestone as part of its broader global expansion strategy: its flagship products, the VIVI Cap and VIVI EPI, are now available through Maccabi Healthcare Services, Israel's second-largest health maintenance...

headline: Will Costco Announce a Special Dividend on Dec. 11?
